net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO

Class AbstractByteWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO.AbstractByteWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IByteRecordWriter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BinaryByteWriter, FixedLengthByteWriter, FujitsuVbByteWriter, MicroFocusByteWriter, VbDumpByteWriter

    public abstract class AbstractByteWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IByteRecordWriter
    This abstract class is the base class for all Byte~Writer classes
    Author:
    Bruce Martin
